statements: SELECT * FROM security_camera_footage WHERE id = 1;
SELECT camera_id, object_detected FROM security_camera_footage WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT location, timestamp FROM security_camera_footage WHERE object_detected = 'person';
SELECT id, camera_id, object_detected FROM security_camera_footage WHERE location = 'Entrance';
SELECT id, object_detected FROM security_camera_footage WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-12-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM security_camera_footage WHERE camera_id = 1 AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, object_detected FROM security_camera_footage WHERE timestamp < '2022-02-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY id;
SELECT camera_id, location FROM security_camera_footage WHERE object_detected LIKE '%person%' LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;
SELECT id, location, object_detected FROM security_camera_footage ORDER BY location, timestamp ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT object_detected, COUNT(id) AS total_count FROM security_camera_footage GROUP BY object_detected HAVING total_count > 3 ORDER BY total_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM security_camera_footage;
SELECT camera_id, location, timestamp FROM security_camera_footage ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, footage_path FROM security_camera_footage WHERE location='Entrance';
SELECT camera_id, location_name, latitude, longitude FROM camera_locations WHERE latitude >= 40 AND longitude <= -73;
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS total_footage FROM security_camera_footage GROUP BY location HAVING total_footage > 10;
SELECT id, camera_id, timestamp, location, footage_path FROM security_camera_footage ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM camera_locations WHERE camera_id = 3
SELECT id, timestamp, location FROM security_camera_footage WHERE camera_id = 2 AND location LIKE '%Main Street%'
SELECT * FROM security_camera_footage WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01'
SELECT footage_path FROM security_camera_footage ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM security_cameras;
SELECT camera_id, location, resolution, install_date FROM security_cameras WHERE resolution='1080p';
SELECT camera_id, timestamp, duration FROM camera_footage ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT f.timestamp, m.object_detected, m.confidence_score FROM camera_footage f JOIN footage_metadata m ON f.footage_id = m.footage_id WHERE m.object_detected='person' ORDER BY f.timestamp ASC;
SELECT f.file_path, c.location FROM camera_footage f JOIN security_cameras c ON f.camera_id = c.camera_id WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM f.timestamp) = 9;
SELECT * FROM security_cameras
SELECT camera_id, location, install_date FROM security_cameras WHERE camera_id = 1
SELECT * FROM camera_footage WHERE duration > 60 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT footage_id, camera_id, timestamp, duration FROM camera_footage INNER JOIN security_cameras ON camera_footage.camera_id = security_cameras.camera_id

SELECT f.metadata_id, f.object_detected, f.confidence_score, c.location FROM footage_metadata f INNER JOIN camera_footage cf ON f.footage_id = cf.footage_id INNER JOIN security_cameras c ON cf.camera_id = c.camera_id
SELECT * FROM security_cameras WHERE location = 'Main Entrance';
SELECT camera_id, installation_date FROM security_cameras WHERE installation_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT location, installation_date FROM security_cameras ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM events WHERE event_time BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT camera_id, event_details FROM events WHERE event_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM security_cameras ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT location, installation_date FROM security_cameras WHERE installation_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY location;
SELECT camera_id, COUNT(metadata_id) AS total_metadata FROM footage_metadata GROUP BY camera_id HAVING COUNT(metadata_id) > 5;
SELECT e.event_id, e.event_time, f.start_time, f.end_time FROM events e INNER JOIN camera_footage f ON e.camera_id = f.camera_id;
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS total_cameras FROM security_cameras GROUP BY location ORDER BY total_cameras DESC;
SELECT * FROM SecurityCameraFootage;
SELECT location, date_time, resolution FROM SecurityCameraFootage WHERE camera_id = 1;
SELECT recording_id, camera_id, end_time FROM CameraRecording ORDER BY end_time DESC;
SELECT detection_type, detection_time FROM MotionDetection WHERE camera_id = 2;
SELECT location_id, location_name, address FROM CameraLocation ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM SecurityCameraFootage WHERE date_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01 08:00:00' AND '2022-01-01 12:00:00';
SELECT location, resolution FROM SecurityCameraFootage WHERE resolution = '4K';
SELECT location, duration FROM SecurityCameraFootage INNER JOIN CameraRecording ON SecurityCameraFootage.camera_id = CameraRecording.camera_id ORDER BY CameraRecording.start_time DESC;
SELECT location_name, address FROM CameraLocation WHERE location_name LIKE '%office%';
SELECT camera_id, status FROM CameraStatus WHERE status = 'active';
